SSVP Biometric Database Client License
======================================

Except where otherwise noted, all of the documentation and software included
in the SSVP Biometric Database Client package is copyrighted by Cynobit.

Copyright (C) 2018 Cynobit. All rights reserved.

This software is provided "as-is," without any express or implied warranty.
In no event shall the author be held liable for any damages arising from the
use of this software.

Permission is granted to anyone to use this software for the purpose of verifying
clients in need for the Society of St. Vincent De Paul, Nationwide,
provided that the following conditions are met:

1. This software shall not be redistributed by any person whether or not, working 
   for the church.

2. This software must have been recieved directlty from a staff of CynoBit or downloaded
   from the product website.
